thread.title: Two air hostesses molested by passenger on Mumbai-Nagpur flight
thread.title_full: Two air hostesses molested by passenger on Mumbai-Nagpur flight

author: News Desk
title: Two air hostesses molested by passenger on Mumbai-Nagpur flight
text:
Share Tweet Email An Indian security official looks on as an aircraft of Jet Airways taxies after landing at Indira Gandhi International Airport in New Delhi on September 12, 2012. PHOTO: AFP 
A 23-year-old drunk trader, identified as Akash Gupta, travelling on seat no 41E was accused of molesting two air hostesses of Jet Airways flight no 9S24460 en-route Mumbai-Nagpur flight on Saturday. 
The air-hostesses gave a written complaint to the captain against the accused, who is a native of Balaghat in Madhya Pradesh. 
Two girls take down harasser on Karachiâ€™s Tariq Road 
Captain Gopalsingh Mohansingh, 42, informed the Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) about the incident and handed Gupta over to them. 
CISF arrested Gupta after contacting the Sonegaon Police and registered an offence of outraging of modesty under section 354 of Indian Penal Code (IPC). 
Saudi diplomat jailed in Singapore for molesting woman 
Gupta was interrogated by the cops and then produced in court, which sent him to magisterial custody on Sunday. 
According to police, Gupta had probably consumed liquor in Mumbai before grabbing the hand of the two air hostesses when they were serving him a meal. Gupta was stopped by other crew members shortly afterwards.
